item.description:
UPDATE: Friend of Harpoon Card Members Special is on for Friday night only! Bring your card with entry for $10.00 and includes 1 drink. We will E Mail the Yes RSVPS on Friday  about meeting there.

Not to be missed!

This is an annual event that takes place rain or shine at Harpoon Brewery celebrating Octoberfest - Fresh Beer and Live Music.

Come enjoy fresh Octoberfest beer, German food, and German Oompah music.

Doors open at 5:30pm on Friday, Setpember 28.

Doors close at 9:30pm Event ends at 11:00pm.

 A wide selection of different styles of fresh beer from Harpoon available for purchase German Food sold by a guest restaurant.

Featuring three stages of live music including New England's premiere German Oompah bands.

Chicken Dancing and Keg Bowling for charity

Must be 21 and older with proper ID.

Cover charge is $20.00 and includes a souvineer Pint Cup and 1 drink ticket.

Cash bar for $5.00 per pint

Free shuttle buses from South Station behind the Federal Reserve on Summer Street

Limited Public Parking available at Garage across the street from Brewery

Take the T Silver Line to Harbor Street stop

Designated driver program available at the event

Buy tickets at the event, no advance sales

FRIEND OF HARPOON SPECIAL  ( Friday night with your FOH card only $10.00)

For more info call 1-888-HAR-POON ext 3 or [url=www.friendofharpoon.com][/url]

More details are available on the Harpoon Brewery web site.

Please check for additional updates.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVPs Coordinate by E Mail with other RSVPs
item.name: 23rd Annual Harpoon Octoberfest at the Harpoon Brewery Tents
